price: 26. Ceux qui ont mécru dirent : « N’écoutez pas ce Coran ! Perturbez sa lecture ! Peut-être serez-vous les vainqueurs. »
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَسۡمَعُواْ لِهَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَٱلۡغَوۡاْ فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَغۡلِبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna kafarū lā tasmaʿū lihādhā al-qur'āni wal-ghaw fīhi laʿallakum taghlibūna
